tag_list: sell-my-story, sell-your-story, sell-story-to-the-press, sell-a-story, media-agent, publicist, journalist, featureworld
overview: Alison Smith-Squire is a media agent and publicist selling stories to UK newspapers, magazines and television for the ordinary person. She is a regular writer for the Daily Mail, Mail on Sunday, Sunday Mirror, Daily Mirror, The Sun, Sunday People, and Daily Star as well as many women’s magazines. Through her website, Featureworld, she also runs a casting service putting people who want to appear on TV in touch with producers and directors. Specialisms include real life, news, pets, health, relationships. Commissions taken, advice given.
